reviewText: All four movies are great!  I couldn't believe they packaged all 4 of these gems for such a low price.  Will watch over and over.  Love the romantic comedies, and these are 4 classics.
Title: Definitely, Maybe / Because I Said So / Love Actually / Notting Hill Four Feature Films

reviewText: I bought this to basically just get Notting Hill for cheap. I watched the other movies and liked them, surprisingly. 4 movies for that price is a steal. Would recommend as great mother's day present.
Title: Definitely, Maybe / Because I Said So / Love Actually / Notting Hill Four Feature Films

reviewText: I bought this DVD because I like romantic comedies.  I love Julia Roberts and the other actors.  Truthfully?  I haven't watched the DVD yet, but I'm sure I will love it.
summary: Four Romantic Comedies in One DVD
Title: Definitely, Maybe / Because I Said So / Love Actually / Notting Hill Four Feature Films

reviewText: This is worth it for either Love Actually or Notting Hill alone but the other movies are good too. Good value too.
Title: Definitely, Maybe / Because I Said So / Love Actually / Notting Hill Four Feature Films

reviewerName: Nanette Traband "BS Liberal Studies, Minor En...
reviewText: I have wanted to own Definitely, Maybe and Love Actually ever since I saw both movies on Satellite TV! Having them accompanied by Because I Said So and Notting Hill was just icing on the cake. Definitely a good value for the money!!
Title: Definitely, Maybe / Because I Said So / Love Actually / Notting Hill Four Feature Films

reviewText: Bought this set of DVD's because it has Love Actually and Notting Hill.  These are such fun movies and it was less expensive to buy them this way than on individual DVDs.If you're thinking that the other two movies will be on a par with these, well, you're going to be disappointed.  The other two are -- well, let me speak plainly -- duds.  Diane Keaton should erase Because I Said So from her resume.  And Definitely, Maybe is pretty low-standard, too.But for fans of Love Actually and Notting Hill, this is a good buy.  Just pretend the other two movies aren't there.
Title: Definitely, Maybe / Because I Said So / Love Actually / Notting Hill Four Feature Films

reviewText: I bought this because it was a great four movie deal. Love Actually is one of my favorite movies. I thoroughly enjoyed Notting Hill. I have not seen the other two movies. But what a bonus to have them on the same DVD.
Title: Definitely, Maybe / Because I Said So / Love Actually / Notting Hill Four Feature Films

reviewText: It doesn't get any better than Ryan Reynolds, Hugh Grant and Julia Roberts.  Hugh Grant hits the mark in every movie.
Title: Definitely, Maybe / Because I Said So / Love Actually / Notting Hill Four Feature Films
